Description: ORCID is a nonprofit organization helping create a world in which all who participate in research, scholarship and innovation are uniquely identified and connected to their contributions and affiliations, across disciplines, borders, and time.

Description: Synapse is an open source software platform that data scientists can use to carry out, track, and communicate their research in real time.
